definition: to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself

sentences.english: A new configuration of an optical ring resonant cavity is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種新結構的光學環形諧振腔。

sentences.english: A new design method to optimize a laser resonator is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種優化設計激光器諧振腔參數的新方法。

sentences.english: The thermostable conditions of Periodic resonators is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 另外，還討論了週期性諧振腔的熱穩條件問題。

sentences.english: The physical property of oscillator driven by quasi-constant field is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了準恆場驅動諧振子的物理特性。

sentences.english: Also the symmetry of the harmonic oscillation Potential is studeied in details.
sentences.chinese: 並且具體地討論了諧振子勢的對稱性。

sentences.english: The advantage and disadvantage of the three varieties of resonator has been analysed based on the actual measurements.
sentences.chinese: 結合實際測量情況，分析了這些諧振器的優缺點。

sentences.english: The procedure is also suitable for the rectangular dielectric resona…
sentences.chinese: 此程序亦適用於任意尺寸的矩形介質諧振器。

sentences.english: The second conductor 104 resonates in a portion of the high band.
sentences.chinese: 第二導體104在高波段的一部分內諧振。

sentences.english: Thin Film Bulk Acoustic Resonator(FBAR) Technology and Its Applications;
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種薄膜體聲波諧振器和它的製備流程。

sentences.english: Rotational vector is a simple and effective means of researching resonance.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉矢量法是研究諧振動的簡潔而有效的方法。

sentences.english: The qualitative factor Q of series resonant circuit for voltage withstanding test is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對串聯諧振耐壓試驗迴路的品質因數Q進行了分析。

sentences.english: Hemispherical resonator gyro is a kind of high accuracy gyro that has wide application perspective.
sentences.chinese: 半球諧振陀螺是一種具有廣闊應用前景的高精度陀螺。

sentences.english: An optical header serial-to-parallel conversion technology using microring resonators is reported.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於微環諧振器的光分組頭串並轉換方法。

sentences.english: Hemispherical shell resonator is the key component of micro-hemispherical resonator gyroscope(micro-HRG).
sentences.chinese: 半球殼諧振體是微型半球諧振陀螺的敏感部件。

sentences.english: Hemispherical shell resonator is the key component of micro-hemispherical resonator gyroscope(micro-HRG).
sentences.chinese: 半球殼諧振體是微型半球諧振陀螺的敏感部件。

sentences.english: Its key part is a axisymmetric shell vibra-tory.
sentences.chinese: 它的核心部件是一個軸對稱殼諧振子。
